mapTicketToTaskFields: assigned_to maps directly

mapTicketToTaskFields: null/undefined fields produce safe defaults (empty string, null, 0)
mapTaskToTicketPrefill: task_name maps to title
mapTaskToTicketPrefill: estimated_hours converts from minutes to hours (รท60)

Both mapping functions never include priority_id in output
PrefillFromTicketDialog: renders ticket search input and TicketSelect dropdown
PrefillFromTicketDialog: tickets are fetched lazily when dialog opens
PrefillFromTicketDialog: auto-link checkbox renders and defaults to checked
PrefillFromTicketDialog: unchecking auto-link excludes ticket from returned prefill data
PrefillFromTicketDialog: confirm button calls getConsolidatedTicketData for selected ticket
PrefillFromTicketDialog: returns correctly mapped fields via onPrefill callback

TaskForm: prefillData prop initializes due_date state
TaskForm: prefillData prop initializes estimated_hours state

TaskForm: Ticket icon button is visible in create mode
TaskForm: Ticket icon button is NOT visible in edit mode

TaskForm: after prefill confirm, all form fields are populated from ticket data

TaskForm: after prefill confirm with auto-link off, no ticket in Associated Tickets
QuickAddTicket: prefilledTitle initializes title input
QuickAddTicket: prefilledAssignedTo initializes assigned user picker
QuickAddTicket: prefilledDueDate initializes date picker
QuickAddTicket: prefilledEstimatedHours initializes estimated hours input

QuickAddTicket: estimated_hours is NOT included in FormData when 0
addTicket action: parses estimated_hours from FormData and stores on ticket
addTicket action: missing estimated_hours in FormData does not cause error
TaskTicketLinks: accepts taskData prop without error
TaskTicketLinks: 'Create Ticket' fetches project client before opening QuickAddTicket
TaskTicketLinks: QuickAddTicket receives all prefill props from task data
TaskTicketLinks: QuickAddTicket receives project client as prefilledClient
TaskForm: passes current field values as taskData to TaskTicketLinks in edit mode
TaskForm: does NOT pass taskData in create mode

CreateTaskFromTicketDialog: status selector shows fetched statuses

MspTicketDetailsContainerClient: injects CreateTaskFromTicketDialog button into TicketDetails
E2E: Create new task in project, use 'Create from ticket' to prefill from existing ticket, save task, verify ticket is linked
E2E: Edit existing task, click 'Create Ticket', verify QuickAddTicket has title/description/client prefilled from task/project, save ticket, verify link
E2E: Open ticket detail, click 'Create Project Task', select project/phase/status, verify TaskForm opens in drawer with fields prefilled, save task
E2E: Verify priority is never prefilled in any of the three flows
